rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3896, M6027}

description: Students will gain knowledge of the pathogenesis and perioperative management of patients with infectious diseases, neurological and neuromuscular disorders, high risk obstetrics and psychiatric disorders. In addition, students will learn to identify the impact of ageing and geriatric care and optimize the management of these patients in the perioperative period.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
